textContent:
2 ounces blend Scotch whisky, preferably Monkey Shoulder
3/4 ounce honey-ginger syrup (see Editor’s Note)
.75 ounce lemon juice
1/4 cup ice
peated Scotch whisky, preferably Laphroaig
Garnish: paper parasol

In a blender, combine first four ingredients and blend until smooth.
Pour into a footed Irish whiskey glass.
Gently pour the peated whiskey on top of the drink.
Serve with a straw and garnish with a paper parasol.

https://punchdrink.com/recipes/penichillin
title: Penichillin
